content: the simple spiral socks are top-down socks with a slip-stitch heel and gusset that feature a fun and easy lace pattern that spirals around the sock to create a visually interesting design and a comfortable and stretchy fabric size 17 5 20 22 5 cm / 7 7 75 8 75 inches foot circumference sizing note the lace pattern creates a fabric that is stretchier than stockinette so the cuff will be slightly looser than the foot please take that into account when selecting the size particularly if you prefer socks with a lot of negative ease gauge 8 stitches x 11 5 row over 2 5cm 1 inch in stockinette
